languages.text: {n}Абеляр, сведя брови, смотрит на тело губернатора.{/n} "Безумие... караемое смертью".
{n}Abelard looks at the governor's body, his brow furrowed.{/n} "Madness... punishable by death."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр, сведя брови, смотрит на тело губернатора.{/n} "Безумие... караемое смертью".

languages.text: {n}Abelard betrachtet mit gerunzelter Stirn die Leiche des Gouverneurs.{/n} "Wahnsinn ... darauf steht die Todesstrafe."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at the governor's body, his brow furrowed.{/n} "Madness... punishable by death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard betrachtet mit gerunzelter Stirn die Leiche des Gouverneurs.{/n} "Wahnsinn ... darauf steht die Todesstrafe."

languages.text: {n}Abélard observe le corps du gouverneur, les sourcils froncés.{/n} « C'est de la folie... Un acte qui mérite la mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at the governor's body, his brow furrowed.{/n} "Madness... punishable by death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard observe le corps du gouverneur, les sourcils froncés.{/n} « C'est de la folie... Un acte qui mérite la mort. »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德看着总督的尸体，皱紧了眉头。{/n}“真是疯了……可以判处死刑。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at the governor's body, his brow furrowed.{/n} "Madness... punishable by death."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德看着总督的尸体，皱紧了眉头。{/n}“真是疯了……可以判处死刑。”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは総督の死体を見て、眉をひそめる。{/n}「狂気は…死によって罰すべし」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at the governor's body, his brow furrowed.{/n} "Madness... punishable by death."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは総督の死体を見て、眉をひそめる。{/n} 「狂気は…死によって罰すべし」

languages.text: {n}Abelard observa el cuerpo del gobernante frunciendo el ceño.{/n} «Qué necedad... merece que lo castiguen con la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at the governor's body, his brow furrowed.{/n} "Madness... punishable by death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard observa el cuerpo del gobernante frunciendo el ceño.{/n} «Qué necedad... merece que lo castiguen con la muerte».

languages.text: {n}Abelard, kaşlarını çatarak valinin cesedine bakıyor.{/n} "Resmen delilik. Cezası ölümdür."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at the governor's body, his brow furrowed.{/n} "Madness... punishable by death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, kaşlarını çatarak valinin vücuduna bakıyor.{/n} "Delilik... Cezası ölüm."
